law.text: No association meeting or activity undertaken in pursuance of the provisions of KRS 247.510 to 247.595 and intended to benefit all of the producers, handlers, and processors of soybeans shall be deemed or considered illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 180, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 3.
